close.Title: Save before closing?
close.Desc: Do you want to save before closing?

npcGen.forceFirstName: Force first names from this race to be used
npcGen.forceLastName: Force last names from this race to be used
npcGen.amountToGen: Are you sure you want to create %n npcs?

useDefault.Hint: Toggles between using default data on top of custom data or custom data only.

reset.Name: Reset
reset.Hint: Resets current view to it's default value.

error.ui: Generating large numbers of NPCs can damage your world, this function is limited to 64 NPCs at a time
error.console: Generating large numbers of NPCs can damage your world ðŸ’£ðŸ’¥ðŸ’€, by default this function is limited to 64 NPCs at a time

exportSettings.Title: Export/Import settings
exportSettings.Label: Open
exportSettings.Hint: Copy or paste all NPC Generator settings

jsonEditor.Title: Custom Generator Entries
jsonEditor.Label: Open Editor
jsonEditor.Hint: Opens a json editor that allows you to add your own entries to the generator. Double click on a tab for an example. Or see examples.md on the github for more info.

roleSpecificImages.Name: Role specific images
roleSpecificImages.Hint: Allows to supply role specific image paths if enabled

compatMode.Name: Save NPCs as character.
compatMode.Hint: Makes the generator save NPCs as a PC instead of NPC. Might improve compatibility.
